(\{ "members", "\ELSPETH:\\
\\r\\nA box of pale mint vellum invitations with an equal number of ivory linen envelopes.\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\nTwo boxes of aquamarine scrolls. - material\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\nThree leather books of various green shades (your choice), embossed with different flowers (ex. - rose on one, tulips on another, daisies on the third)\
\\r\\n\
OWED 234\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\n\\r\\n\\r\\n " \})
(\{ "visitors", "This is your guest page. This is the page your visitors see when they come here.", (\{ "page", "Main Page", "default" \}) \})

(\{ "members", "To work out prices for orders;\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\nFor example;\
\\r\\nOne ledger:\
\\r\\nLeather: 5 florins\
\\r\\nDye: black - 5 florins\
\\r\\nStandard embossing: 10 florins\
\\r\\nBase unit: 10 florins\
\\r\\nTotal: 30 florins\
\\r\\nBase unit prices for each item.\
\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\nBook - 16 pages (10 florins each)\
\\r\\n\ Tome - 35 pages (10 florins each)\
\\r\\n\ Large tome - 50 pages (10 florins each)\ \
\\r\\nLedger - 16 pages (10 florins each)\
\\r\\n\ Journal - 16 pages (10 florins each)\ \
\\r\\nLedger (10 florins each)\ \
\\r\\nSketchbook (10 florins each)\ \
\\r\\nPoetry Book (10 florins each)\ \
\\r\\nBookmark (5 florins) \
\\r\\nBroadsheet (5 florins)\ \
\\r\\nLeaflet (5 florins)\
\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\nFolders:\
\\r\\n\ Folder (10 florins)\ \
\\r\\nPattern Folder (10 florins)\
\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\nStationary Items:\
\\r\\n\ Scroll (2 florins)\ \
\\r\\nScroll Box (10 florins)\
\\r\\nCard Box (10 florins each)\
\\r\\nInvitation Box (10 florins each)\
\\r\\nInvitation\ Card (2 florins)\ \
\\r\\nEnvelope (2 florins)\
\\r\\n\ Package (10 florins)\ \
\\r\\nGift-box (10 florins)\
\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\nCharged at cost;\
\\r\\n25 florins - a ream of cotton paper\
\\r\\n20 florins - a ream of hemp paper\
\\r\\n30 florins - a ream of linen paper\
\\r\\n150 florins - a ream of parchment\
\\r\\n200 florins - a ream of vellum\
\\r\\nBirch Bark ( florins per ream)\
\\r\\nPapyrus (15 florins per ream)\
\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\nSpecial materials:\
\\r\\nPolished Bone (35 per unit used)\
\\r\\nHorn (50 per unit used)\
\\r\\n\ Alligator skin (various colours) (35 per unit used)\ \
\\r\\nViper skin (various colours) (35 per unit used)\
\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\nEmbossing:\
\\r\\nCharged per use (i.e 7 books and 7 standard embossings = 70)\
\\r\\nCustom patterns can be completed for an additional 15 florins per design. \
\\r\\nStandard embossings are 10.\
\\r\\n\\r\\n" \})

(\{ "members", "1 Florins: Burlap, Hemp, Sackcloth \& Wool.\
\\r\\n2 Florins: Buckram, Calico, Cambric, Canvas, Cotton, Felt, Flannel, Gambroon, Gingham, Leather, Linen, Lockram, Satin, Tweed \& Woolsey\
\\r\\n3 Florins: Broadcloth, Brocade, Gingham, Jaspe, Lawn, Percaline, Sheer Cotton, Sheer Linen, Suede \& Whipcord.\
\\r\\n4 Florins: Buffin, Frieze, Grogram, Homespun, Kersey, Melton, Poplin, Serge, Stammel, Velvet \& Worsted.\
\\r\\n5 Florins: Damask \& Muslin.\
\\r\\n8 Florins: Batiste \& Silk\
\\r\\n25 Florins: Corduroy, Crushed velvet, Dupion, Sheer silk, Soft velvet, Velveteen \& Watered silk.\
\\r\\n35 Florins: Challis, Chantilly Lace, Charmeuse, Chinchilla Fur, Faille, Fur, Guipure Lace, Heavy Linen, Herringbone Tweed, Lace, Organdy, Reticella Lace, Samite, Taffeta, Twilled Homespun, Waterproof Canvas.\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\n25 florins - a ream of cotton paper\
\\r\\n20 florins - a ream of hemp paper\
\\r\\n30 florins - a ream of linen paper\
\\r\\n150 florins - a ream of parchment\
\\r\\n200 florins - a ream of vellum\
\\r\\n25 florins - a ream of Papyrus \
\\r\\n20 florins - a ream of Birch bark\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\r\\n\
\\r\\nDYES\
\\r\\nBLACK:\
\\r\\n1 Denarii: Black.\
\\r\\n4 Denarii: Charcoal black, ebony \& murky black.\
\\r\\n7 Denarii: Obsidian black.\
\\r\\n8 Denarii: Raven \& jet-black.\
\\r\\n9 Denarii: Midnight black, sooty black, \& dingy black.\
\\r\\n35 Denarii: Black-to-grey ombre, iridescent black, pearlescent black, shadow black, shadowy black, shimmering black \& wilight black.\
\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\nBLUE:\
\\r\\n1 Denarii: Blue, cyan, dark blue \& light blue.\
\\r\\n2 Denarii: Indigo, blue-green \& blue-grey.\
\\r\\n3 Denarii: Cobalt blue, sapphire \& navy blue.\
\\r\\n4 Denarii: Turquoise, dark turquoise \& baby blue.\
\\r\\n5 Denarii: Teal, cadet blue \& blue-violet.\
\\r\\n6 Denarii: Royal blue, peacock blue \& aquamarine.\
\\r\\n7 Denarii: Azure, midnight blue, cerulean \& ocean blue.\
\\r\\n8 Denarii: Cornflower blue, ice blue, steel blue \& pale blue.\
\\r\\n9 Denarii: Chalcedony blue, azure mist, \& pearl aqua.\
\\r\\n35 Denarii: Aspen blue, blue-to-green, borealis blue, deep twilight, dusty aqua, glossy chalcedony blue, hydrangea blue, lapis Blue, mellow mazarine, opaque chambray blue, pastel blue, rich royal blue, satiny blue, Shimmering blue-green, shimmering ice blue, silver-flecked blue \& sparkling pale blue.\
\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\nBROWN:\
\\r\\n1 Denarii: Brown, dark brown \& light brown.\
\\r\\n3 Denarii: Sable, russet \& tan.\
\\r\\n4 Denarii: Beige, sienna \& rich brown.\
\\r\\n6 Denarii: Sandy brown \& khaki.\
\\r\\n7 Denarii: Chocolate \& wheat colored.\
\\r\\n8 Denarii: Dark chocolate, umber \& bistre.\
\\r\\n9 Denarii: Caramel, taupe \& bronze.\
\\r\\n10 Denarii: Copper, cinnamon, \& auburn.\
\\r\\n11 Denarii: Hazel, creamy chocolate, \& golden brown.\
\\r\\n35 Denarii: Bronzed bisque, coffee Brown, copper shimmer, earthy brown, honey-hued cocoa \& lustrous mocha.\
\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\nGREEN:\
\\r\\n1 Denarii: Dark green, green, \& light green.\
\\r\\n2 Denarii: Light sage, olive green \& sage.\
\\r\\n3 Denarii: Emerald, chartreuse \& vibrant green.\
\\r\\n4 Denarii: Apple green, peacock green \& viridian.\
\\r\\n5 Denarii: Mint green \& clover green.\
\\r\\n6 Denarii: Pale mint green \& jade.\
\\r\\n7 Denarri: Sea green, spring green \& myrtle green.\
\\r\\n8 Denarii: Fern green, forest green, hunter green \& midnight green.\
\\r\\n9 Denarii: Dioptase green, pine green, \& beryl green.\
\\r\\n10 Denarii: Harlequin, feldgrau, \& spring green.\
\\r\\n11 Denarii: Wintergreen, dark feldgrau, mint green, \& dark spring green.\
\\r\\n35 Denarii: Dazzling dioptase green, gold-flecked green, hemlock green, honeydew, moss green \& shimmering blue-green.\
\\r\\n\
\
\\r\\nGREY:\
\\r\\n1 Denarii: Dark grey, grey \& light grey.\
\\r\\n3 Denarii: Slate grey.\
\\r\\n5 Denarii: Ash grey \& dusky grey.\

\\r\\n\\r\\nMetallic:\

\

\\r\\n1 Denarii: Dark orange, light orange \& orange.\

\\r\\n4 Denarii: Gamboge \& pumpkin-colored.\

\

\\r\\n1 Denarii: Dark red, light red \& red.\

\
\\r\\nWHITE:\

(\{ "members", "Philouran Bindery receives one FREE import request per month, in exchange for a 15% discount on orders from members of the Consulate of Scotland.\\r\\n\\r\\nLord Azru, Sir Valdus, Valentin, Jayland, Margrat and Oghren." \})
